LoginForm.LogoutSuccess: You have been logged out successfully.

FieldErrors.blank: This field may not be blank.

invalid_credentials.Username: The combination of username and password is invalid. Please try again.
invalid_credentials.Email: The combination of email and password is invalid. Please try again.
invalid_credentials.UsernameOrEmail: The combination of username or email and password is invalid. Please try again.

ForgotPassword.Description: Please enter the email address you registered with. We will send you an email with a link to a page, where you can reset your password.

EmailActivation.SuccessTitle: Your email address has been activated successfully
EmailActivation.SuccessText: Your account was successfully activated. Please continue to login to start using our service!

Errors.activation_link_invalid: The activation link you tried to use is invalid. This may be due to a typo, or because it has been used already.
Errors.general: An error occurred during activation of your email address.
